text: Joonas Vahtera (born 6 January 1996) is a Finnish football player who plays for RoPS, on loan from HJK Helsinki. ==Club career== He made his Veikkausliiga debut for VPS on 8 April 2016 in a game against HJK. Vahtera signed for HJK Helsinki on 21 December 2018.JOONAS VAHTERA KLUBIIN, hjk.fi, 21 December 2018 On 31 July 2020, Vahtera joined RoPS on loan for the remainder of the 2020 season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Sportspeople from Vaasa Category:Living people Category:Finnish footballers Category:Finland under-21 international footballers Category:Vasa IFK players Category:Vaasan Palloseura players Category:Helsingin Jalkapalloklubi players Category:Kakkonen players Category:Ykkönen players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Association football defenders
title: Joonas Vahtera
